#summary Notes on Dingoo SDL

= Keybindings =

Native Dingo SDL key/button bindings are the same as the Dingux SDL bindings, viz.

|| http://www.dingoowiki.com/images/d/da/Up.png || D-pad up        || SDLK_UP ||
|| http://www.dingoowiki.com/images/f/f9/Down.png || D-pad down      || SDLK_DOWN ||
|| http://www.dingoowiki.com/images/7/7f/Leftright.png || D-pad left      || SDLK_LEFT ||
|| http://www.dingoowiki.com/images/7/7f/Leftright.png || D-pad right     || SDLK_RIGHT ||
|| http://www.dingoowiki.com/images/7/70/A.png || A button        || SDLK_LCTRL ||
|| http://www.dingoowiki.com/images/5/57/B.png || B button        || SDLK_LALT ||
|| http://www.dingoowiki.com/images/a/a5/X.png || X button        || SDLK_SPACE ||
|| http://www.dingoowiki.com/images/8/8a/Y.png || Y button        || SDLK_LSHIFT ||
|| http://www.dingoowiki.com/images/b/b8/Start.png || START button    || SDLK_RETURN ||
|| http://www.dingoowiki.com/images/e/e8/Select.png || SELECT button   || SDLK_ESCAPE ||
|| http://www.dingoowiki.com/images/f/fe/L.png || Left shoulder   || SDLK_TAB ||
|| http://www.dingoowiki.com/images/f/f7/R.png || Right shoulder  || SDLK_BACKSPACE ||
|| ? || POWER UP button || SDLK_PAUSE ||

Images in table from http://dingoowiki.com/index.php?title=Editing:Guidelines#Controls_section

See [http://code.google.com/p/pirate-dev/downloads/detail?name=keyCodes.zip keyCodes.zip] from http://code.google.com/p/pirate-dev/downloads/list for key identification.
